data.Sentence_cn: 渔夫和水手们有时声称自己看到过海里的妖怪。
data.Sentence: Fishermen and sailors sometimes claim to have seen monsters in the sea.

data.Sentence_cn: 虽然人们常常对水手们讲的故事付诸一笑，
data.Sentence: Though people have often laughed at stories told by seamen,

data.Sentence_cn: 但现在看来，人们有时看到的这些“妖怪”很多不过是些奇怪的鱼。
data.Sentence: it is now known that many of these 'monsters' which have at times been sighted are simply strange fish.

data.Sentence_cn: 一些异常的生物偶尔会被冲到岸上来，但它们在海上却极少能被捕到。
data.Sentence: Occasionally, unusual creatures are washed to the shore, but they are rarely caught out at sea.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而不久前，在马达加斯加附近的海里却捕到了一条奇怪的鱼。
data.Sentence: Some time ago, however, a peculiar fish was caught near Madagascar.

data.Sentence_cn: 一条小渔船被一条咬住钩的强壮的大鱼拖到了几英里以外的海面上。
data.Sentence: A small fishing boat was carried miles out to sea by the powerful fish as it pulled on the line.

data.Sentence_cn: 那位渔民意识到这根本不是一条普通的鱼，于是千方百计不让它受到丝毫伤害。
data.Sentence: Realizing that this was no ordinary fish, the fisherman made every effort not to damage it in any way.

data.Sentence_cn: 当终于把它弄上岸后，人们发现它身长超过了13英尺。
data.Sentence: When it was eventually brought to shore, it was found to be over thirteen feet long.

data.Sentence_cn: 它长着一个像马一样的头，有着大的蓝眼睛和闪闪发光的银色皮肤，还有一条鲜红色的尾巴。
data.Sentence: It had a head like a horse, big blue eyes, shining silver skin, and a bright red tail.

data.Sentence_cn: 此鱼叫桨鱼，被送进了博物馆，现正接受一位科学家的检查。
data.Sentence: The fish, which has since been sent to a museum where it is being examined by a scientist, is called an oarfish.

data.Sentence_cn: 人们很少能看到活着的这类动物，因为它们生活在600英尺深的水下。
data.Sentence: Such creatures have rarely been seen alive by man as they live at a depth of six hundred feet.
